title: The Week of Judy Rodriguez: Hero in the City
summary: Judy Rodriguez discovers her unique power to amplify people's skills through her words, which she uses to halt a corporate espionage in her town over a week.
summaryGerman: Judy Rodriguez entdeckt ihre einzigartige Fähigkeit, die Fähigkeiten der Menschen durch ihre Worte zu verstärken, die sie verwendet, um eine Wirtschaftsspionage in ihrer Stadt über eine Woche zu stoppen.
summaryDutch: Judy Rodriguez ontdekt haar unieke kracht om de vaardigheden van mensen te versterken met haar woorden, die ze gebruikt om een bedrijfsspionage in haar stad gedurende een week te stoppen.
summaryFrench: Judy Rodriguez découvre son pouvoir unique d'amplifier les compétences des gens grâce à ses mots, qu'elle utilise pour arrêter un espionnage corporatif dans sa ville sur une semaine.

story.text: Judy Rodriguez, an energetic marketing consultant, feels unusually energetic while leading a promotional seminar. She accidentally inspires a participant with dormant art skills to start a new career.
After discovering her power, Judy feels triumphant and decides to test her abilities by instructing her neighbors. They quickly excel at activity they had barely performed before.
Judy receives eerie anonymous messages warning her to cease her newfound activities. Unfazed, she uses her promoting skills to rally her community against local injustices.
Unknown adversaries attempt to sabotage her efforts, leading Judy into an epic confrontation. She gives a speech that invigorates the entire town to stand together.
Amid growing support, Judy uncovers a plan to steal town's business secrets. Using her promotional talents, she sets a trap by announcing a fake seminar decoy.
The trap catches the corporate spies, broadcasting their confession live. Judy's community celebrates their peace, and she realizes the power of purposeful promotion.
Feeling peaceful, Judy reflects on her week. She pledges to use her power responsibly, ensuring her city remains a beacon of empowerment and unity.

ending: And so, Judy Rodriguez continued her journey, forever changing her community one inspiring word at a time.
moral: Even the simplest words can carry the power to change lives when spoken with enough belief and intent.
